store._comment: The cost and per is not intended to used with 0. Make sure coins are enabled too, or else there will be some errors and bugs.

afk_page._comment: Make sure coins are enabled if you choose to enable this option!
afk_page._comment_2: If you change the path, you need to restart for it to take full effect.
afk_page._comment_3: This afk page will give the users [coins variable] coins every [every variable] seconds.
afk_page._comment_4: The coins variable is meant to not be under 1. There may be bugs if the coins variable is less than 1.
